Do you have a friend that doesn't have #rstats, but wants to run your code, and does have #docker? 
Here's a docker one-liner that runs my_script.R üòä 

docker run --rm \
-v $(pwd):/tmp/working_dir \
-w /tmp/working_dir \
rocker/tidyverse:latest \
Rscript my_script.R https://t.co/RTxsEpudyz
